content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the execute_shell command to list the files in my directory and found a file called "atlas.yaml". I then used the read_file command to learn that Atlas is a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul with the goal of exploring the world. I attempted to use the execute_python_code command, but received an error. I then used the browse_website command to find interesting places for Atlas to explore, including Boston, Porto, Switzerland, and sustainable travel tips. I used the google command to search for the best places to visit in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland for adventurers and received a list of websites with travel information. I tried to open some of the websites using the execute_shell command, but received an error that the command is not allowed. I used the execute_python_code command to install iputils-ping and test internet connection. I used the web_search command to find information about Stara Pradelna house location. I attempted to browse the website alltrails.com to find hiking trails near Brno but
"""

Type of Place\\nplace_type = \\"park\\"\\n\\n# Define the Fields to Retrieve\\nfields = [\\"name\\", \\"formatted_address\\", \\"geometry\\", \\"rating\\", \\"types\\"]\\n\\n# Perform a Nearby Search\\nplaces = client.places_nearby(location=location, keyword=search_query, radius=radius, type=place_type, fields=fields)\\n\\n# Print the Results\\nfor place in places[\\"results\\"]:\\n
